verses.verse: וְהַנָּחָשׁ֙ <WH5175> Now the serpent הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> was עָר֔וּם <WH6175> more subtil מִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> any חַיַּ֣ת <WH2416> than any beast הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> of the field אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> had made יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> God וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And he said אֶל־ <WH413> to הָ֣אִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> unto the woman אַ֚ף <WH637> Yea כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אָמַ֣ר <WH559> said אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> hath God לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תֹֽאכְל֔וּ <WH398> Ye shall not eat מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> any עֵ֥ץ <WH6086> of every tree הַגָּֽן׃ <WH1588> garden

וַתֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said הָֽאִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> And the woman אֶל־ <WH413> to הַנָּחָ֑שׁ <WH5175> unto the serpent מִפְּרִ֥י <WH6529> of the fruit עֵֽץ־ <WH6086> of the trees הַגָּ֖ן <WH1588> of the garden נֹאכֵֽל׃ <WH398> We may eat

וּמִפְּרִ֣י <WH6529> But of the fruit הָעֵץ֮ <WH6086> of the tree אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בְּתוֹךְ־ <WH8432> which [is] in the midst הַגָּן֒ <WH1588> of the garden אָמַ֣ר <WH559> hath said אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> God לֹ֤א <WH3808> shall not תֹֽאכְלוּ֙ <WH398> Ye shall not eat מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <WH4480> at וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> or תִגְּע֖וּ <WH5060> of it neither shall ye touch בּ֑וֹ פֶּן־ <WH6435> it lest תְּמֻתֽוּן׃ <WH4191> ye die
וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said הַנָּחָ֖שׁ <WH5175> And the serpent אֶל־ <WH413> to הָֽאִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> unto the woman לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not מ֖וֹת <WH4191> Ye shall not surely תְּמֻתֽוּן׃ <WH4191> die

כִּ֚י <WH3588> for יֹדֵ֣עַ <WH3045> doth know אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> For God כִּ֗י <WH3588> in בְּיוֹם֙ <WH3117> that in the day אֲכָלְכֶ֣ם <WH398> ye eat מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <WH4480> at וְנִפְקְח֖וּ <WH6491> shall be opened עֵֽינֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5869> thereof then your eyes וִהְיִיתֶם֙ <WH1961> will be like כֵּֽאלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> and ye shall be as gods יֹדְעֵ֖י <WH3045> knowing ט֥וֹב <WH2896> good וָרָֽע׃ <WH7451> and evil

וַתֵּ֣רֶא <WH7200> saw הָֽאִשָּׁ֡ה <WH802> And when the woman כִּ֣י <WH3588> for טוֹב֩ <WH2896> [was] good הָעֵ֨ץ <WH6086> that the tree לְמַאֲכָ֜ל <WH3978> for food וְכִ֧י <WH3588> for תַֽאֲוָה־ <WH8378> [was] pleasant ה֣וּא <WH1931> and that it לָעֵינַ֗יִם <WH5869> to the eyes וְנֶחְמָ֤ד <WH2530> to be desired הָעֵץ֙ <WH6086> and a tree לְהַשְׂכִּ֔יל <WH7919> to make [one] wise וַתִּקַּ֥ח <WH3947> she took מִפִּרְי֖וֹ <WH6529> of the fruit thereof וַתֹּאכַ֑ל <WH398> and did eat וַתִּתֵּ֧ן <WH5414> and gave גַּם־ <WH1571> also לְאִישָׁ֛הּ <WH582> another עִמָּ֖הּ <WH5973> her and he וַיֹּאכַֽל׃ <WH398> with her and he did eat

וַתִּפָּקַ֙חְנָה֙ <WH6491> were opened עֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> And the eyes שְׁנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH8147> of them both וַיֵּ֣דְע֔וּ <WH3045> knew כִּ֥י <WH3588> for עֵֽירֻמִּ֖ם <WH5903> that they [were] naked הֵ֑ם <WH1992> and they וַֽיִּתְפְּרוּ֙ <WH8609> together עֲלֵ֣ה <WH5929> leaves תְאֵנָ֔ה <WH8384> fig וַיַּעֲשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> and made themselves לָהֶ֖ם חֲגֹרֹֽת׃ <WH2290> aprons

וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֞וּ <WH8085> And they heard אֶת־ <WH853> ק֨וֹל <WH6963> the voice יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> God מִתְהַלֵּ֥ךְ <WH1980> walking בַּגָּ֖ן <WH1588> in the garden לְר֣וּחַ <WH7307> in the cool הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> of the day וַיִּתְחַבֵּ֨א <WH2244> hid themselves הָֽאָדָ֜ם <WH120> and Adam וְאִשְׁתּ֗וֹ <WH802> and his wife מִפְּנֵי֙ <WH6440> from the presence יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> God בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> amongst עֵ֥ץ <WH6086> the trees הַגָּֽן׃ <WH1588> of the garden
וַיִּקְרָ֛א <WH7121> called יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> God אֶל־ <WH413> unto הָֽאָדָ֑ם <WH120> unto Adam וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> and said ל֖וֹ אַיֶּֽכָּה׃ <WH335> Where

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֶת־ <WH853> קֹלְךָ֥ <WH6963> thy voice שָׁמַ֖עְתִּי <WH8085> I heard בַּגָּ֑ן <WH1588> in the garden וָאִירָ֛א <WH3372> and I was afraid כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because עֵירֹ֥ם <WH5903> [was] naked אָנֹ֖כִי <WH595> because I וָאֵחָבֵֽא׃ <WH2244> and I hid myself

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said מִ֚י <WH4310> Who הִגִּ֣יד <WH5046> told לְךָ֔ כִּ֥י <WH3588> for עֵירֹ֖ם <WH5903> naked אָ֑תָּה <WH859> you הֲמִן־ <WH4480> from הָעֵ֗ץ <WH6086> of the tree אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> of which צִוִּיתִ֛יךָ <WH6680> whereof I commanded thee לְבִלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> that thou shouldest not אֲכָל־ <WH398> eat מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> at אָכָֽלְתָּ׃ <WH398> burn up

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> said הָֽאָדָ֑ם <WH120> And the man הָֽאִשָּׁה֙ <WH802> The woman אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom נָתַ֣תָּה <WH5414> whom thou gavest עִמָּדִ֔י <WH5978> [to be] with me הִ֛וא <WH1931> she נָֽתְנָה־ <WH5414> gave לִּ֥י מִן־ <WH4480> from הָעֵ֖ץ <WH6086> me of the tree וָאֹכֵֽל׃ <WH398> and I did eat

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> God לָאִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> unto the woman מַה־ <WH4100> What זֹּ֣את <WH2063> hast עָשִׂ֑ית <WH6213> What [is] this [that] thou hast done וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> And the woman הַנָּחָ֥שׁ <WH5175> The serpent הִשִּׁיאַ֖נִי <WH5377> beguiled me וָאֹכֵֽל׃ <WH398> and I did eat

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> said יְהֹוָ֨ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֱלֹהִ֥ים ׀ <WH430> God אֶֽל־ <WH413> to הַנָּחָשׁ֮ <WH5175> unto the serpent כִּ֣י <WH3588> Because עָשִׂ֣יתָ <WH6213> hast done זֹּאת֒ <WH2063> likewise אָר֤וּר <WH779> this thou [art] cursed אַתָּה֙ <WH859> Because thou מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all הַבְּהֵמָ֔ה <WH929> above all cattle וּמִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> every חַיַּ֣ת <WH2416> and above every beast הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <WH7704> of the field עַל־ <WH5921> on גְּחֹנְךָ֣ <WH1512> upon thy belly תֵלֵ֔ךְ <WH1980> will go וְעָפָ֥ר <WH6083> and dust תֹּאכַ֖ל <WH398> shalt thou eat כָּל־ <WH3605> All יְמֵ֥י <WH3117> all the days חַיֶּֽיךָ׃ <WH2416> of thy life

וְאֵיבָ֣ה ׀ <WH342> enmity אָשִׁ֗ית <WH7896> And I will put בֵּֽינְךָ֙ <WH996> Between וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> and between הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> between thee and the woman וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> Between זַרְעֲךָ֖ <WH2233> and between thy seed וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> Between זַרְעָ֑הּ <WH2233> and her seed ה֚וּא <WH1931> He יְשׁוּפְךָ֣ <WH7779> it shall bruise רֹ֔אשׁ <WH7218> thy head וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> and you תְּשׁוּפֶ֥נּוּ <WH7779> and thou shalt bruise עָקֵֽב׃ <WH6119> his heel ס

אֶֽל־ <WH413> to הָאִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> Unto the woman אָמַ֗ר <WH559> he said הַרְבָּ֤ה <WH7235> I will greatly אַרְבֶּה֙ <WH7235> multiply עִצְּבוֹנֵ֣ךְ <WH6093> thy sorrow וְהֵֽרֹנֵ֔ךְ <WH2032> and thy conception בְּעֶ֖צֶב <WH6089> in sorrow תֵּֽלְדִ֣י <WH3205> thou shalt bring forth בָנִ֑ים <WH1121> children וְאֶל־ <WH413> will be for אִישֵׁךְ֙ <WH376> [shall be] to thy husband תְּשׁ֣וּקָתֵ֔ךְ <WH8669> and thy desire וְה֖וּא <WH1931> and he יִמְשָׁל־ <WH4910> and he shall rule בָּֽךְ׃ ס

וּלְאָדָ֣ם <WH121> And unto Adam אָמַ֗ר <WH559> he said כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because שָׁמַעְתָּ֮ <WH8085> Because thou hast hearkened לְק֣וֹל <WH6963> unto the voice אִשְׁתֶּךָ֒ <WH802> of thy wife וַתֹּ֙אכַל֙ <WH398> and hast eaten מִן־ <WH4480> from הָעֵ֔ץ <WH6086> of the tree אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> of which צִוִּיתִ֙יךָ֙ <WH6680> I commanded thee לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תֹאכַ֖ל <WH398> Thou shalt not eat מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <WH4480> at אֲרוּרָ֤ה <WH779> of it cursed הָֽאֲדָמָה֙ <WH127> [is] the ground בַּֽעֲבוּרֶ֔ךָ <WH5668> because בְּעִצָּבוֹן֙ <WH6093> for thy sake in sorrow תֹּֽאכֲלֶ֔נָּה <WH398> shalt thou eat כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> [of] it all יְמֵ֥י <WH3117> the days חַיֶּֽיךָ׃ <WH2416> of thy life

וְק֥וֹץ <WH6975> Thorns also וְדַרְדַּ֖ר <WH1863> and thistles תַּצְמִ֣יחַֽ <WH6779> shall it bring forth לָ֑ךְ וְאָכַלְתָּ֖ <WH398> to thee and thou shalt eat אֶת־ <WH853> עֵ֥שֶׂב <WH6212> the herb הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <WH7704> of the field

בְּזֵעַ֤ת <WH2188> In the sweat אַפֶּ֙יךָ֙ <WH639> of thy face תֹּ֣אכַל <WH398> shalt thou eat לֶ֔חֶם <WH3899> bread עַ֤ד <WH5704> till שֽׁוּבְךָ֙ <WH7725> thou return אֶל־ <WH413> to הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> unto the ground כִּ֥י <WH3588> Because מִמֶּ֖נָּה <WH4480> at לֻקָּ֑חְתָּ <WH3947> for out of it wast thou taken כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because עָפָ֣ר <WH6083> for dust אַ֔תָּה <WH859> thou וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to עָפָ֖ר <WH6083> [art] and unto dust תָּשֽׁוּב׃ <WH7725> shalt thou return

וַיִּקְרָ֧א <WH7121> called הָֽאָדָ֛ם <WH120> And Adam שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> name אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <WH802> his wife's חַוָּ֑ה <WH2332> Eve כִּ֛י <WH3588> because הִ֥וא <WH1931> he הָֽיְתָ֖ה <WH1961> become אֵ֥ם <WH517> because she was the mother כָּל־ <WH3605> of all חָֽי׃ <WH2416> of all living

וַיַּעַשׂ֩ <WH6213> make יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> did the LORD אֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> God לְאָדָ֧ם <WH120> Unto Adam וּלְאִשְׁתּ֛וֹ <WH802> also and to his wife כָּתְנ֥וֹת <WH3801> coats ע֖וֹר <WH5785> of skins וַיַּלְבִּשֵֽׁם׃ <WH3847> and clothed them פ

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <WH559> said יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> God הֵ֤ן <WH2005> Behold הָֽאָדָם֙ <WH120> the man הָיָה֙ <WH1961> has become כְּאַחַ֣ד <WH259> is become as one מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <WH4480> of Us לָדַ֖עַת <WH3045> of us to know ט֣וֹב <WH2896> good וָרָ֑ע <WH7451> and evil וְעַתָּ֣ה ׀ <WH6258> and now פֶּן־ <WH6435> might יִשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> and now lest he put forth יָד֗וֹ <WH3027> his hand וְלָקַח֙ <WH3947> and take גַּ֚ם <WH1571> also מֵעֵ֣ץ <WH6086> also of the tree הַֽחַיִּ֔ים <WH2416> of life וְאָכַ֖ל <WH398> and eat וָחַ֥י <WH2425> and live לְעֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> for ever

וַֽיְשַׁלְּחֵ֛הוּ <WH7971> sent him forth יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Therefore the LORD אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> God מִגַּן־ <WH1588> from the garden עֵ֑דֶן <WH5731> of Eden לַֽעֲבֹד֙ <WH5647> to till אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> the ground אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לֻקַּ֖ח <WH3947> from whence he was taken מִשָּֽׁם׃ <WH8033> in it

וַיְגָ֖רֶשׁ <WH1644> So he drove out אֶת־ <WH853> הָֽאָדָ֑ם <WH120> the man וַיַּשְׁכֵּן֩ <WH7931> and he placed מִקֶּ֨דֶם <WH6924> at the east לְגַן־ <WH1588> of the garden עֵ֜דֶן <WH5731> of Eden אֶת־ <WH853> הַכְּרֻבִ֗ים <WH3742> Cherubims וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> לַ֤הַט <WH3858> and a flaming הַחֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH2719> sword הַמִּתְהַפֶּ֔כֶת <WH2015> which turned every way לִשְׁמֹ֕ר <WH8104> to keep אֶת־ <WH853> דֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> the way עֵ֥ץ <WH6086> of the tree הַֽחַיִּֽים׃ <WH2416> of life ס
